column4: I think it is *not* acceptable answer to tell ferronica to upgrade from dapper to edgy to fix his problem reading a WinXP Pro partition. Dapper supports this.
I'm not saying that it's an acceptable answer because of reading a fat/ntfs partition.
I'd rather have the 3 year support for my machines. I tried edgy on one of them and had all sorts of problems.
I also gave ferronica a link.
